Name: maximize_completed_story_points
Description: Maximize the total story points completed per sprint

Name: minimize_open_blockers
Description: Minimize the number of unresolved blockers at sprint end

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize average team velocity over the last 3 sprints

Name: minimize_task_effort_deviation
Description: Minimize the difference between estimated and actual effort per task

Name: maximize_requirement_traceability
Description: Maximize the percentage of user stories linked to tasks

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failures
Description: Minimize the number of sprints where the goal was not achieved

Name: maximize_stakeholder_participation
Description: Maximize the number of stakeholders attending sprint reviews

Name: minimize_technical_debt_accumulation
Description: Minimize the number of low-quality or overdue tasks

Name: maximize_skill_coverage
Description: Maximize the alignment of team skills with feature requirements

Name: minimize_schedule_slippage
Description: Minimize the delay between planned and actual sprint end dates

Name: maximize_documentation_completeness
Description: Maximize the number of features with up-to-date documentation

Name: minimize_worker_overload
Description: Minimize the number of workers exceeding 100% availability

Name: maximize_backlog_refinement_rate
Description: Maximize the percentage of refined backlog items before sprint planning
